properties.name: eureka.client.healthcheck.enabled
properties.description: Enables the Eureka health check handler.

properties.name: eureka.client.refresh.enable
properties.description: Determines whether the EurekaClient instance can be refreshed or not(If disabled none of the Eureka client properties will be refreshable).

properties.name: eureka.client.webclient.enabled
properties.description: Enables the use of WebClient for Eureka HTTP Client.

properties.name: eureka.client.jersey.enabled
properties.description: Enables the use of JerseyClient for Eureka HTTP Client.

properties.name: eureka.instance.metadata-map.weight
properties.description: The weight of service instance for weighted load balancing.
